title: Chinese Beef Noodle Soup with Shiitake Mushrooms
ingredients: ['2 tbsp soy sauce', '1 tbsp toasted sesame oil', '2 tbsp Chinese rice wine or dry sherry', '300g lean rump steak, sliced into very thin strips', '1 litre beef stock, made with stock cubes', '4 spring onions, sliced', '150g shiitake mushrooms, thickly sliced', '200g baby pak choi, leaves halved', '200-250g instant fine egg noodles', '1 tbsp sunflower oil']
